sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

description.narrative: Integrated management systems established for collaborative planning and management for managing threats at the basin level
23 Establishment of an effective basin level crosssectoral institutional mechanism with representation from PA local communities and local government

comment.narrative: No basin level crosssectoral institutional mechanism now exist
Operational basinlevel coordination mechanism

A crosssectoral Shengjin Lake Basin Management Committee in Chizhou City established Legislative Affairs Office of the municipal government Municipal Development and Reform Commission and other 18 departments will work together to strengthen the cooperation coordination and management effectiveness of Shengjin Lake WPA
Operational basinlevel coordination mechanism

A crosssectoral Shengjin Lake Basin Management Committee in Chizhou City established Legislative Affairs Office of the municipal government Municipal Development and Reform Commission and other 18 departments will work together to strengthen the cooperation coordination and management effectiveness of Shengjin Lake WPA

comment.narrative: No systems for knowledge management and exchange
Knowledge management and exchange systems developed
Expect to be done in 2016

Expect to be done in 2016

description.narrative: 22 a Basin Plan for Shengjin Lake basin is developed and approved by Chizhou City government and applied in at least two additional nature reserves b Sustainable ecotourism plan for Shengjin Lake basin is developed

comment.narrative: a No Basin Plan and tourism plan exist now b No ecotourism plan for Shengjin Lake NR and basin exists now
A completed and approved intersectoral basin plan developed and applied in NRs Sustainable ecotourism plan developed and implemented

The Integrated Shengjin Lake Basin Management Plan was drawn up and will be finished in 2016
The Sustainable ecotourism plan for Shengjin Lake basin will start to be drawn up in the fourth quarter of 2015 in accordance with the project workplan
A completed and approved intersectoral basin plan developed and applied in NRs Sustainable ecotourism plan developed and implemented

The Integrated Shengjin Lake Basin Management Plan was drawn up and will be finished in 2016
The Sustainable ecotourism plan for Shengjin Lake basin will start to be drawn up in the fourth quarter of 2015 in accordance with the project workplan

description.narrative: Provincial capacity for PA management is enhanced and pressure on wetland systems are reduced by provision of safeguards and legislation that provide protection from sector practices by increased and sustainable financing of the PA system and by increasing the protected wetland area in the province
14 a Increase in government financing for PA operations including PA infrastructure development b develop other revenue sources and increase the part directly for wetland protection

comment.narrative:
Operations
1077000
Infrastructure etc
3970000

For Provincial WPAs operational budget is increased by 30 to 1400000
Infrastructure etc budget is increased by 30 to 5161000

Annual increment of Operations 5 increase 1130850
Annual increment of Infrastructure etc 6 increase 4208200
Plans for the target 1 Push for more funding from central government on wetland conservation The secured budget from central government for Anhui wetland conservation was about 10 million USD in 2015 2 Push for more funding from Provincial finance 3 Push for bringing the staff cost of NNRs Provincial NRs and national wetland parks in provincial finance

For Provincial WPAs operational budget is increased by 30 to 1400000

description.narrative: 13 Improve and issue the Regulations on Wetlands Protection of Anhui Province

comment.narrative: There are no specific provincial wetlands regulations
Prov wetlands regulations are promulgated by the Provincial Peoples Congress PPC

The draft of Wetland Regulation for Anhui Province was finished and was in the process of being revised The latest review was made by Office of Legislative Affairs of Anhui Province which is expected to be enacted in late 2015
Prov wetlands regulations are promulgated by the Provincial Peoples Congress PPC

The draft of Wetland Regulation for Anhui Province was finished and was in the process of being revised The latest review was made by Office of Legislative Affairs of Anhui Province which is expected to be enacted in late 2015

description.narrative: 11 a New WPA coverage increased by 80000 ha b 3 wetlands of provincial level identified to be promoted to national PAs c Shengjin Lake Wetland identified to be listed as a Ramsar site and endorsed by SFA and Government of China

comment.narrative: a Current protected area coverage is 353200 ha b Anqing Riverine PNR and Huayanghe Lakes PNR intend to be upgraded as NNR c no NNR listed as a Ramsar site in Anhui Province
Expansion of WPA coverage by 80000 ha 3 provinciallevel wetland upgraded to national PAs Shengjin Lake NNR listed as a Ramsar site and endorsed by SFA and Government of China
15 pilot provinciallevel wetland parks were established and the wetland protected area increased further by 30202 ha in 2014 which had achieved 378 of the total target

15 pilot provinciallevel wetland parks were established and the wetland protected area increased further by 30202 ha in 2014 which had achieved 378 of the total target

description.narrative: Strengthened operational capacities reduces onsite threats to biodiversity in Shengjin Lake NNR
31 Shengjin Lake NNR Management Plan is developed and approved

comment.narrative: No Management Plan
Full Management Plan approved and implemented
Shengjin Lake NNR Management Plan was drawn up and will be finished in 2016
Full Management Plan approved and implemented
Shengjin Lake NNR Management Plan was drawn up and will be finished in 2016

description.narrative: 34 Area of key habitat restored through comanagement and populations of key species such as Oriental Stork Siberian White Crane Hooded Crane and Swan Goose are stabilised

comment.narrative:
Several lake habitats are degraded
Reports of decrease in key wildfowl species

At least 50 of the wildfowl habitats are restored with at least 3 times natural aquatic vegetation than prerestoration
Population of key species remaining stable

The total population of key species winter birds reduced from 2012 to 2014 The corresponding actions planned NRs and Local people in 5 WPAs patrol and monitor wetland biodiversity through comanagement and the work of restoring and demonstrating waterfowl habitat at the upper and middle lakes of Shengjin Lake and neighboring WPAs will start from 2016 according to the work plan

At least 50 of the wildfowl habitats are restored with at least 3 times natural aquatic vegetation than prerestoration
Population of key species remaining stable

The total population of key species winter birds reduced from 2012 to 2014 The corresponding actions planned NRs and Local people in 5 WPAs patrol and monitor wetland biodiversity through comanagement and the work of restoring and demonstrating waterfowl habitat at the upper and middle lakes of Shengjin Lake and neighboring WPAs will start from 2016 according to the work plan

description.narrative: 33 a the professional skills of the staff have been improved b local communities can get benefit from PA community comanagement

comment.narrative: a Capacity building in the reserve needs to be done b there is almost no economic benefit for communities
Conservation protection skills increased benefit increased by 10 from METT baseline
EHI training was held and 12 staff from 7 NRs attended Public awareness was raised though Wetland Day and Birdloving Week
Conservation protection skills increased benefit increased by 10 from METT baseline
EHI training was held and 12 staff from 7 NRs attended Public awareness was raised though Wetland Day and Birdloving Week

description.narrative: 32 a determine fishing quota of the lake based on its ecological capacity Incidence of encroachment of intensive fishing in lake habitats especially in core areas reduced b improve biodiversity and ecosystem health of Shengjin Lake Anqing Riverine Wetlands and Shibasuo

comment.narrative:
a No fishing quota based on ecological capacity calculation Encroachment is taking place b EHI
Shengjin Lake 045 Anqing Riverine Wetlands 043 and Shibasuo 041

Fishing quota determined By end of project all fishing carried out according to established quotas and outside the core areas Note If economic activities are excluded from the core areas there are no waters for them and it is impossible to implement the component of the project ecotourism fisheries with quotas
EHI Targets
Shengjin Lake 070
Anqing WPA 061
Shibasuo WPA 063

Selfassessment by WPAs staff
Shengjin Lake 052
Anqing WPA 0483
Shibasuo WPA 047 The habitat connectivity water supply and oxygen levels had been improved due to most of the fishing nets were moved in the upper and middle lakes of Shengjin Lake and the lake is restored gradually All these aspects led the improvements in the Shengjin Lake EHI scores Actions The Integrated Shengjin Lake Basin Management Plan and other neighboring WPA plans will be developed The project will also have subcontracts to restore and demonstrate waterfowl habitat at the upper and middle lakes of Shengjin Lake build small artificial wetland have training and communication to reduce sewage emission through local community comanagement
Work of fishing quota and habitats restoration will start in the fourth quarter of 2015 in accordance with the project workplan

description.narrative: To strengthen the management effectiveness of the wetland protected area system in Anhui in response to existing and emerging threats to the globally significant biodiversity and essential ecosystem services
New wetland protected areas coverage increased by 80000 ha

comment.narrative: Current protected area coverage is 353200 ha or 495 of natural wetlands in the province
Expansion of WPA coverage by 80000 ha

15 pilot provinciallevel wetland parks were established and the wetland protected area increased further by 30202 ha in 2014 which had achieved 378 of the total target These 15 pilot wetland parks along Yangtze River in Anhui have great value of biodiversity and will strengthen the management effectiveness of Anhui WPAs
Expansion of WPA coverage by 80000 ha

15 pilot provinciallevel wetland parks were established and the wetland protected area increased further by 30202 ha in 2014 which had achieved 378 of the total target These 15 pilot wetland parks along Yangtze River in Anhui have great value of biodiversity and will strengthen the management effectiveness of Anhui WPAs
